definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
lifetime/generation/group of people/class/classifier for generations/(literary) classifier for people

sentences.english: Dogs look up to you; cats look down on you; pigs treat you as an equal.
sentences.chinese: 狗對人敬仰，貓對人鄙視，豬把人當作平輩。
